message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?
I understand you're still a bit above budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $11250, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10500?
